wikipedia_page.main: Neil Entwistle (born September 18, 1978) is an English man convicted of murdering his American wife, Rachel, and their infant daughter, Lillian, on January 20, 2006, in Hopkinton, Massachusetts, United States. He was sentenced to life imprisonment without parole and is incarcerated at Old Colony Correctional Center in Bridgewater, Massachusetts.

response: * Neil Entwistle (b. 1978), convicted of the 2006 murder of his wife and daughter
Episode 3 takes a look at Neil Entwistle, who murdered his wife and child.  It aired on 5 June 2013.
